titles.title: 510 Has Thou No Scar (familiar tune nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hast thou no scar?
No hidden scar
On foot or side or hand?
I hear thee sung
Throughout the land
I hear them hail thy shining star
Hast thou no scar?
No scar?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hast thou no wound?
Yet I was wounded
By the archers spent
Leaned Me against
A tree and rent
By ravening beasts
'Round me I swooned
Hast thou no wound?
No wound?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
No wound? No scar?
Yet as the Master
Shall the servant be
And pierced the feet
That follow Me
But whole?
Can he have followed far
Who has no wound
No scar?
